Name: Short Non-fiction Variety
Description: This is an enumerated list of possible types of written short non-fiction works, such as essay, article, introduction, etc., and functions primarily as a list to be used by the "short non-fiction" type. Please be conservative about adding new topics to this type. Topics such as "review" or "interview", which are indeed (usually) short works of non-fiction have their own types. (In general, if a variety of non-fiction needs properties beyond author, subject, and place of publication, it should have its own type.)
